name: Vampire Dystopia
description:
Vampire Dystopia, as the name suggests takes place in a world that has been over run with vampires. You survive the barren wastelands by day, searching for supplies and fight to survive at night.

As the game progressed it became more of a spiritual successor of Dangerous Dave 2 but instead of the platformer element there is a survival element.

2d shooter horror survival couch co op.
